page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: In New Sawley, the privately owned houses date from 1860. There are new semi-detached houses and detached houses and bungalows. Currently being built by 'Wimpey' are 2 bedroomed semi-detached houses at Â£23-24000, 3 bedroomed semi-detached houses at Â£27000 & 4 bedroomed detached houses at Â£37000. Twenty year old semi-detached houses in the area are for sale at Â£24-26000. Old Sawley houses are mainly terraced or semi-detached houses and detached houses privately owned. There is also an estate of semi-detached houses & flats owned by the local council. At Shardlow there are restored 18th century cottages which were originally provided by the Canal Company for their workers, also large houses originally built for the rich warehouse owners.
